ModMetaData.name: Floors Are Light! [Path]
ModMetaData.author: PathogenXD
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Vanilla, Royalty, and Stuffed Floors (by Fluffy) to require more realistic terrain affordances.
Wooden floors and Carpets now require only Light affordance. Metal floors and Sterile tile now require Medium afforance. Stone floors and Concrete still require Heavy affordance.
